name: Oh My Bar
author: Mobeen Abdullah

sections.description:
Oh My Bar is a WordPress plugins which will eventually have many type of bars but currently it has a Read Bar which is a reading progress bar which helps users to give a visual representaiton of how much a blog article or a page is remaining to read.

Features :

  • Easy to install and use
  • Fully responsive on all devices
  • Customizable colors
  • Adjustable height and position
  • Lightweight and fast
  • Convenient User Interface

Credits :

  • Range Slider – Library for customized range slider
  • Pickr – Library for a simple color picker
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin and activate it from plugins page in the Dashboard
  2. Go to “Oh My Bar” settings from the menu
  3. Enable the Read Bar and customize the colors, height etc as per your needs
sections.faq:
Where can I find the settings of Read Bar?

Once you’ve installed and activate the plugin, go to Dashboard and click on “Oh My Bar” from the left menu

Why the Read Bar is not showing on my site?

Please make sure that you’ve enabled the Read Bar from the settings which can be found on Dashboard > “Oh My Bar” settings page

Can I use it on any other page except the blog posts?

Yes, you can show the Read Bar on any page, post, archive and home page

Is this plugin free?

Yes, this plugin is completely free
